name: Crowbar Life 3 or The Waiting Place
name_original: Crowbar Life 3 or The Waiting Place
description:
I started  as a level design test with Unreal Engine 4.  It was looking nice, I told on twitter I was making Half Life 3 because I can't wait for valve. It went almost viral. Hope people understand is a joke,  a single person can't make that huge project.  That deserve a bigger and serious team.

You can download and play the level on Windows, it just walk around. 

Future of this demo:

 I'll try to add more sounds and interactivity, maybe some weapons. I was thinking about designing a relaxing and quiet waiting place.  So you can go there and fee like you are Gordon Freeman waiting for Half Life 3.
